synopsis.text: This anime follows the journey of Xiao Qing, a green snake-demon, who finds herself trapped in the modern and dystopian city of Asuraville after a failed attempt to rescue her husband and sister from the powerful monk Fahai. Stripped of her demonic powers, Xiao Qing must navigate through a world filled with creatures from various eras, including a clan of ox warriors causing chaos and terror. Along the way, she encounters a mysterious man suffering from amnesia and a cunning fox demon who offers her a chance to escape the city in exchange for all her memories. With few alternatives and danger lurking around every corner, Xiao Qing must find a way to save her sister, Blanca, and escape the clutches of Fahai while surviving in this unfamiliar world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
